title: SquishyCoin
author: SquishyCoin
content: Squishy Coinhttps://i.ibb.co/vwN9chs/squishy-logo.pngFunny little bird coin, with a funny name that aims to change the way we use and look at cryptocurrency in the future. IntroductionSquishyCoin (SQCN) is a cryptocurrency that leverages the Equihash 200,9 algorithm, zk-SNARKs technology, and a decentralized architecture to offer secure and private transactions. By combining the features of Equihash, zk-SNARKs, and decentralization, SQCN aims to address the increasing demand for privacy and anonymity in the cryptocurrency landscape.Technical SpecificationsMining Algorithm: Equihash 200,9Privacy and Anonymity: zk-SNARKsSQCN incorporates zk-SNARKs (Zero-Knowledge Succinct Non-Interactive Arguments of Knowledge) technology to enable private transactions. zk-SNARKs allow users to prove the validity of a transaction without revealing any sensitive information, such as the sender, recipient, or transaction amount. Open SourceSQCN is an open-source project, meaning that its codebase is publicly available for review, scrutiny, and contribution by the community. Open-source development fosters transparency, innovation, and community collaboration.COIN SPECIFICATIONS23,000,000 max coin amount25 coin current block reward(6 total eras 100, 25, 12.5, 6.25, 3.125, 1.5625)7 min block time25% staking rewardsEquihash 200,9 algorithmP2P/RPC ports 21349/21350RESOURCESWebsitehttps://www.squishycoin.usBlock Explorerhttp://explorer.squishycoin.usMining Poolhttp://pool.squishycoin.usExchangehttps://xeggex.comTwitterhttps://twitter.com/SqcnDevMiningpoolstatshttps://miningpoolstats.stream/squishycoinCoinpaprikahttps://coinpaprika.com/coin/sqcn-squishy-coinGithub / Walletshttps://github.com/sqcndev/SquishyCoinDiscordhttps://discord.com/invite/zxbBrzAqhZDevelopmentSquishy Coin developers are currently working hard to bring new ways to use Squishy Coin in the near future, please see our future roadmap for more information.Come trade Squishy Coin on XEGGEX.com
